translation: Hey, uh, you sure we're safe with old Bug Eyes over there?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Hey, uh, you sure we're safe with old Bug Eyes over there?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: We're still in Three's territory, ya know?{LF}He could stab us in the back pretty much anytime.{#Name="Dito"}
source: We're still in Three's territory, ya know?{LF}He could stab us in the back pretty much anytime.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I welcome men to my side, and then I bed them.{LF}That's just how it works.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I welcome men to my side, and then I bed them.{LF}That's just how it works.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I'll worry about everything else later.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'll worry about everything else later.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: That's rather accommodating.{LF}...In a lot of ways.{#Name="Dito"}
source: That's rather accommodating.{LF}...In a lot of ways.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Seriously, though...{LF}You'd bump uglies with that old bag of bones?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Seriously, though...{LF}You'd bump uglies with that old bag of bones?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Lady Three must be in a panic now that her own{LF}disciple has betrayed her.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Lady Three must be in a panic now that her own{LF}disciple has betrayed her.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Hopefully she keeps her head on straight.{LF}Those giant scissors of hers are dangerous.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hopefully she keeps her head on straight.{LF}Those giant scissors of hers are dangerous.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Scissors? She has...scissors!?{LF}You can cause such exquisite pain with scissors! Nnngh...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Scissors? She has...scissors!?{LF}You can cause such exquisite pain with scissors! Nnngh...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Big fan of scissors, are we?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Big fan of scissors, are we?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Yeah, if they're cuttin' off his junk...{#Name="Dito"}
source: Yeah, if they're cuttin' off his junk...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I can't wait to see Lady Three's toys.{LF}Er, her scissors! Ahhh...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I can't wait to see Lady Three's toys.{LF}Er, her scissors! Ahhh...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Sure is lively now that we have all these friends, huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Sure is lively now that we have all these friends, huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Friends? I have no friends here.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Friends? I have no friends here.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Huh? What about me? And Dito?{LF}And Decadus? And Octa?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Huh? What about me? And Dito?{LF}And Decadus? And Octa?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: A dummy, a psycho, a waste of space, and a pervert.{LF}Yeah, we're a merry band, all right.{#Name="Zero"}
source: A dummy, a psycho, a waste of space, and a pervert.{LF}Yeah, we're a merry band, all right.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: That's mean, Zero!{LF}...Um, I'm not the pervert, am I?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: That's mean, Zero!{LF}...Um, I'm not the pervert, am I?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I'd like to think of myself as your friend, at least...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I'd like to think of myself as your friend, at least...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: So, why you dropping Three?{#Name="Zero"}
source: So, why you dropping Three?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Because my appetite for LOVE is unsated!{LF}I need bootie in the morning, I need my afternoon delight,{LF}I need sweet love under the stars of—{#Name="Octa"}
source: Because my appetite for LOVE is unsated!{LF}I need bootie in the morning, I need my afternoon delight,{LF}I need sweet love under the stars of—{#Name="Octa"}

translation: All right, all right! I got it.{#Name="Zero"}
source: All right, all right! I got it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: To do nothing but plunder the feedbox, day after day,{LF}would make me the happiest man alive!{#Name="Octa"}
source: To do nothing but plunder the feedbox, day after day,{LF}would make me the happiest man alive!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: And yet, Lady Three begs off at every opportunity.{LF}How can I stay with someone like that?{#Name="Octa"}
source: And yet, Lady Three begs off at every opportunity.{LF}How can I stay with someone like that?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: 乗ってくださらなくなったスリイ様と、{LF}これ以上一緒にいる意味がどこに？{#Name="オクタ"}
source: 乗ってくださらなくなったスリイ様と、{LF}これ以上一緒にいる意味がどこに？{#Name="オクタ"}

translation: Oh ho ho! The shrine lies beyond the Forest of Fog.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh ho ho! The shrine lies beyond the Forest of Fog.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Probably full of traps and enemies and other annoying{LF}shit like that, huh?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Probably full of traps and enemies and other annoying{LF}shit like that, huh?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Well, it does involve a trial or two, yes.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Well, it does involve a trial or two, yes.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: But if you desire carnal action in the great outdoors,{LF}there's simply no better place!{#Name="Octa"}
source: But if you desire carnal action in the great outdoors,{LF}there's simply no better place!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Proceed to the next mission?{#Name=" "}
source: Proceed to the next mission?{#Name=" "}

translation: みんなで一つの場所に集まって話すデモ{#Name=" "}
source: みんなで一つの場所に集まって話すデモ{#Name=" "}

translation: I would hope that you, Lady Zero, would be intelligent{LF}enough to recognize my value.{#Name="Octa"}
source: I would hope that you, Lady Zero, would be intelligent{LF}enough to recognize my value.{#Name="Octa"}
